coverageList.empty: No Pokémon found or no types selected

weakness.heading: Weakness Coverage List
weakness.description: These Pokémon are weak to at least one of the selected types.

normal.heading: Normal Effectiveness Coverage List
normal.description: These Pokémon are not in the weakness or resistance lists for the selected types.

resistance.heading: Resistance Coverage List
resistance.description: These Pokémon are resistant to all of the selected types.

coverage.heading: Pokédex Coverage
coverage.paragraph1: Import/export custom Pokédex CSV files to see coverage for different Pokémon. Create a custom CSV file with just the OU tier Pokémon, or even create your own Pokémon from scratch.
coverage.paragraph2: CSV data is loaded by column header name, not column order, so you can add or re-order columns if you want (e.g. add a “tier” column, or a “notes” column).
coverage.paragraph3: CSV files can be edited with Google Sheets, Microsoft Excel, OpenOffice, LibreOffice, Notepad, and more.

export.description: Export the default Pokédex to a CSV file

import.description: Import an edited Pokédex CSV file

status.imported: Imported {{ n }} Pokémon forms from “{{ file }}”
status.errored: Error loading CSV. Don't change header names.

search.description: Search by name, number, or types

searchByName.heading: Search pokemon by name
searchByName.description: Looking for a Pokémon? Enter its name, and even if you remember just part of it, the system should be able to locate it.

searchByNumber.heading: Search pokemon by number
searchByNumber.description: Find Pokémon using their national dex number. For example if you want Bulbasaur, just enter 1, not #001.

searchByType.heading: Search pokemon by type
searchByType.description: Explore various search options based on types.

type.description: Find Pokémon that include fire as one of their types, such as Charmander, Charizard, and Rotom.

doubleType.description: Explore Pokémon that have a water/flying combination (like Gyarados) or a flying/water combination (such as Cramorant).

singleType.description: Look for Pokémon specifically categorized as grass type with no additional secondary type, such as Tangela, Chikorita, and Lilligant.

contact.heading: Reach out to me...
contact.intro: Hey there! My name is <homepage>Rohit Kesharwani</homepage>, and I'm the mind behind the Pokémon Type Calculator website. As a freelance developer, I specialize in creating websites and other projects. If you have a need, don't hesitate to contact me.
contact.email: Feel free to share your thoughts and expressions of gratitude by sending an email to <email>me@rohitkesharwani.com</email>.

language.label: Change Language
language.helpText: Language support is incomplete. Please email me, I will pay you to translate.

theme.label: Theme
theme.help: “System default” will change automatically depending on your operating system settings.

typeCount.label: Number of Types
typeCount.help: Pokémon can briefly have three types at once if hit with Forests’s Curse or Trick-or-Treat. The third type field is hidden by default since it is rarely used.

serviceWorker.description: Resolve app-related issues by simply pressing this button.

privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Your experience here is ad-free, and your personal data is secure. This platform is powered by open hosting, is self-funded, independent, hosted in the EU, and operates without storing any cookies on your computer.

givingBack.heading: Conveying Thanks
givingBack.description: Could you please consider linking this website to your webpage, sharing it on your social media, discussing it in groups, or including it in any of your streams or YouTube videos? I've dedicated numerous hours to improving this site, and if you appreciate what I've created, your support in spreading the word would be greatly appreciated.

openSource.heading: Download Source Code
openSource.description: Source code is available on <github>WebTech By Rohit</github>.

games.label: Game Generation
games.help: Use type effectiveness from different game generations.
